properties.query:
with
detection
as
(
    select 
        *
    from [iot-hub] partition by PartitionId
    where StartWindow > LAG(EndWindow) OVER (PARTITION BY BatchId LIMIT DURATION(hour, 1))
),
dataWindows
as
(
    select 
        *
    from [iot-hub] partition by PartitionId
    where StartWindow = LAG(EndWindow) OVER (PARTITION BY BatchId LIMIT DURATION(hour, 1))
)

Select detection.BatchId, detection.StartWindow, detection.EndWindow
into [detected-data-gaps]
from detection

Select dataWindows.BatchId, dataWindows.StartWindow, dataWindows.EndWindow
into [data-windows-sql]
from dataWindows

Select *
into [ingress-metadata]
from [iot-hub]

properties.description: Failure Anomalies notifies you of an unusual rise in the rate of failed HTTP requests or dependency calls.

packages:
  - moby-cli
  - moby-engine
runcmd:
  - dcs="',variables('dcs'),'"
  - |
      set -x
      (

        # Wait for docker daemon to start
        while [ $(ps -ef | grep -v grep | grep docker | wc -l) -le 0 ]; do 
          sleep 3
        done

        sudo apt-get install aziot-edge

        if [ ! -z $dcs ]; then
          mkdir /etc/aziot
          wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Azure/iotedge-vm-deploy/master/config.toml -O /etc/aziot/config.toml
          sed -i "s#\(connection_string = \).*#\1\"$dcs\"#g" /etc/aziot/config.toml
          iotedge config apply -c /etc/aziot/config.toml
        fi

      ) &
'))]
